title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system, including user personas, use cases, and functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system, including components, data flow, integration points, scalability considerations, performance optimizations, security measures, and maintainability best practices. Provide a modular design that allows for easy extension and maintenance. Consider edge cases, error handling mechanisms, and performance bottlenecks. Also, outline the strategies to handle potential conflicts due to time zone differences.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system, including user authentication, team management, and meeting scheduling.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system, including team and user management, meeting scheduling, and time zone handling.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user, team, and meeting data.

title: Implement Security and Authentication
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, as well as security best practices for handling sensitive data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user and technical documentation for the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of the GlobalTeamTimeSynchronizer system.
